member.name: T:System.Resources.IResourceWriter
member.summary: Provides the base functionality for writing resources to an output file or stream.

member.name: M:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.AddResource(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Adds an 8-bit unsigned integer array as a named resource to the list of resources to be written.
member.param: Value of a resource as an 8-bit unsigned integer array.
member.exception: The name parameter is null.

member.name: M:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.AddResource(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds a named resource of type to the list of resources to be written.
member.exception: The name parameter is null.

member.name: M:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.AddResource(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a named resource of type to the list of resources to be written.
member.exception: The name parameter is null.

member.name: M:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Close
member.summary: Closes the underlying resource file or stream, ensuring all the data has been written to the file.

member.name: M:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Generate
member.summary: Writes all the resources added by the method to the output file or stream.

member.name: T:System.Resources.ResourceWriter
member.summary: Writes resources in the system-default format to an output file or an output stream. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceWriter.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes the resources to the provided stream.
member.exception: The stream parameter is not writable.
The stream parameter is null.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceWriter.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes the resources to the specified file.
member.exception: The fileName parameter is null.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceWriter.AddResource(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Adds a named resource specified as a byte array to the list of resources to be written.
member.param: Value of the resource as an 8-bit unsigned integer array.
member.exception: name (or a name that varies only by capitalization) has already been added to this .
The name parameter is null.
This has been closed and its hash table is unavailable.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceWriter.AddResource(System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Adds a named resource specified as a stream to the list of resources to be written.
member.param: The name of the resource to add.
The value of the resource to add. The resource must support the property.
member.exception: name (or a name that varies only by capitalization) has already been added to this . -or- The stream does not support the property.
name or value is null.
This has been closed.

member.summary: Adds a named resource specified as an object to the list of resources to be written.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceWriter.AddResource(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a string resource to the list of resources to be written.

The name parameter is null.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceWriter.AddResource(System.String,System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a named resource specified as a stream to the list of resources to be written, and specifies whether the stream should be closed after the method is called.
member.param: The name of the resource to add.
The value of the resource to add. The resource must support the property.
true to close the stream after the method is called; otherwise, false.
member.exception: name (or a name that varies only by capitalization) has already been added to this . -or- The stream does not support the property.
name or value is null.
This has been closed.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceWriter.AddResourceData(System.String,System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Adds a unit of data as a resource to the list of resources to be written.
member.param: A name that identifies the resource that contains the added data.
The type name of the added data.
A byte array that contains the binary representation of the added data.
member.exception: name, typeName, or serializedData is null.
name (or a name that varies only by capitalization) has already been added to this object.
The current object is not initialized. The probable cause is that the object is closed.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Close
member.summary: Saves the resources to the output stream and then closes it.
member.exception: An I/O error has occurred.
An error has occurred during serialization of the object.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Dispose
member.summary: Allows users to close the resource file or stream, explicitly releasing resources.
member.exception: An I/O error has occurred.
An error has occurred during serialization of the object.

member.name: M:System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Generate
member.summary: Saves all resources to the output stream in the system default format.
member.exception: An I/O error occurred.
An error occurred during serialization of the object.
This has been closed and its hash table is unavailable.

member.name: P:System.Resources.ResourceWriter.TypeNameConverter
member.summary: Gets or sets a delegate that enables resource assemblies to be written that target versions of the .NET Framework prior to the .NET Framework 4 by using qualified assembly names.
member.returns: The type that is encapsulated by the delegate.
